title: Hanleys; or, Wheels within wheels
author: Caumont, Mary.
snippet: What for no ane o' the Farquharson girlies ? Their faither's a weel-to-do sugar-refiner. Or auld Miss Jessie MacWhirter an' her sax hindert acres 'tither side Traprain Law ? I h'ard tell Miss Jessie said she'd gie her hand an' heart to a minister o' the Free Kirk o' Scotland, or to naebody."
